casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellant, v. Berry, Appellee.

[Cite as State v. Berry (1986), 23 Ohio St. 3d 231.]

(No. 85-1186 Decided May 7, 1986.) Jim Slagle, prosecuting attorney, for appellant. Wiedemann & Taube and Donald H. Taube, for appellee.

This cause oh appeal from the court of appeals (case No. 9-84-10) is reversed on authority of State v. Rohdes (1986), 23 Ohio St. 3d 225, decided this date.

Celebrezze, C.J., Sweeney, Locher, Holmes, C. Brown, Douglas and Wright, JJ., concur.
